Kaiteki Alpha

The comfy Fediverse client

Use now • Download

Supports everything

Kaiteki supports the most common Fediverse platforms alongside other social media. Kaiteki can be used on any device, thanks to Flutter.

Delightful user interface

Kaiteki ships a colorful and soft Material Design theme.

We need your help!

Anyone from application design expierence to translators are needed.

Check out the contribution page for find out on how you can help.

Made with <3 by Craftplacer and contributors GitHub • Telegram • Fediverse
